entry.title: $1775 // Bright and sunny 1 Bed Apartment +_+ gut renovation
entry.content:
text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID#22386 from this ad.

1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: DeKalb Av. Bright and sunny 1 Bed Apartment, gut renovation in nice building, brand new s/s appliances. Big closets, You can't beat the location here folks. The building is located in the heart of Bushwick, 3 blocks from the Jefferson L, steps from Hana Food/Wine, Pearls Billy and Social Club, Bushwick 5 pointz, Los Hermanos Tacos, Cobra Club Yoga, Bathaus co-working, Northeast Kingdom, Strange Ways coffee.

AMENITIES
Hardwood floors
Stainless Steel Appliances
Common courtyard
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Built in microwave
Stone countertops
Outdoor Space

entry.title: $2400 // 2 Bed 2 Bath in Bushwick with IN UNIT LAUNDRY!!
entry.content:
Spacious 2 Bedroom apartment with beautiful hardwood flooring throughout. Has an open concept living room and modern kitchen with stone countertops and stainless steel appliances, including a large dishwasher and built in microwave. Also has high ceiling with recessed lighting. Bedrooms are spacious as well, with windows and closets. Also has LAUNDRY IN UNIT!! And there is a shared front yard as well. SEE PICS!! For more information/to schedule a showing, text Ricky anytime at show contact info
, and mention "Listing 138," so I know which apartment you're referring to. Thanks!
